newsitem.title: USA: Muni sales total $1.95 bln for week of August 26.
newsitem.headline: Muni sales total $1.95 bln for week of August 26.

text.p: Scheduled competitive and negotiated municipal bond sales, depending on market conditions, could total $1.95 billion in 96 offerings for the week of August 26, according to Reuters Municipal Bond Information Group.
Competitive sales for the week are expected to total about $290 million in 52 offerings.

Negotiated sales, depending on market conditions, could total $1.66 billion in 44 offerings for the week of August 26. The largest issue is a $377 million New York State Dormitory Authority revenue bond through Smith Barney Inc. --U.S. Municipal Information Group, 212-859-1826
